about_the_game:
What would a sequel to Hades be without an all-new blood-pumping soundtrack by award-winning composer Darren Korb? Music has always been essential to the experience of each title from Supergiant Games, and Hades II is no exception, with an original soundtrack crafted to fit the bewitching theme and variety of all-new characters and environments.

Though still in Early Access, this soundtrack is already nearly as expansive as that of the original game, with close to two-and-a-half hours of original music... and still more tracks to be added as development continues.
